item.title: Home 30
item.dc:creator: huydat
item.content:encoded:
Discover Now ride strong. ride Safety. Bluetooth and Video Integrated Cycling Helmet

The new flagship product

Designed To Protect

The aerodynamically perfectly shaped and ventilated uvex race 5 protrudes with both, a dynamic alignment and technical performance. View Design

Smart Cycling Helmet

Bluetooth and Video Integrated

Smart Cycling Helmet Multifunction Intelligent Lights Music Take Photo SOS Alert Sharing Bluetooth Helmet Phone Answ

all features

Comfortable for high performances

Very high quality moisture wicking material has carbon fibres to suppress bacterial growth. Extremely comfortable and soft on the skin.

Button-press adjustment

Multi-stage and anatomically shaped: comfort closure opens and closes at the touch of a button, with just one hand.

Easy and practical

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape. 

Interchangeable
liner

Interior features significantly affect a helmet’s comfort. All our pads absorb moisture and are anti-allergenic.

High quality stems

From Superior Materials

Advanced fit systems provide the perfect adjustment, in every direction, to match every
individual head shape.

watch video

hi-tech features

Designed To Protect

SOS Alert

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Phone Call

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Smart Lighting

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Take Photo

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Data Collecting

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Music

Fast Adapting System webbing can be easily and continuously tailored to your exact head shape.

Why wait? Order yours now.

And get 10%off your first order

Shop now
